Milwaukee.Sprecher Brewery: Sprecher Brewery is a brewery in Glendale, Wisconsin, USA. It was founded in 1985 in Milwaukee by Randal Sprecher, and is Milwaukee's first craft brewery since Prohibition. Sprecher produces an assortment of beers, flavored malt beverages and sodas. Sprecher produces another line of beers under its Chameleon Brewing Company label that is well-respected but not widely available.
